title: About
text:
I am Jack Xu, a thirteen year old who loves birds!
My GitHub account: https://www.github.com/jackxu3
My email: bluebird.jack.xu@gmail.com
My project is about how light pollution affects migratory birds, such as gulls, by reducing rest time and increasing flight speed.
GitHub repository link: https://github.com/jackxu3/bird-light-pollution
This project was created as a part of Kane’s Free Data Science Bootcamp.

title: Analyzing Light Pollution and Bird Migration
text:
Summary
Light pollution affects rest and flight behavior of migratory birds. I gathered data from Kaggle showing three lesser black-backed gulls’ flight paths in 2013 and 2014. The dataset from Globe at Night – Sky Brightness Monitoring Network in 2023 shows light pollution levels. Using this data, we seek to understand the relationship between rest duration and flight speed with light pollution levels. More light pollution causes less time for bird rest and higher flight speeds, showing hyperactivity and disorientation.

title: Sources
text:
I got the bird migration dataset from Kaggle and the light pollution dataset from Globe at Night.
I cleaned the downloaded data by removing unwanted columns and kept the Latitude, Longitude, and LimitingMag columns.
I removed rows before with no value by piping to na.omit().
